AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: Vehicle used in the transportation of undocumented aliens on Interstate Highway 35, containing a camper compartment with 14 additional males, stopped more than 100 miles from the United States-Mexican border. Occupants were unwashed and unkempt, and made attempts to evade detection. Exhibited unusually heavy and overloaded appearance, fogged windows, and slow speed.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.marked border patrol sedan: United States Border Patrol vehicle used by agents Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron for surveillance and arrest
